Sentencas: Glass from the melting of basaltic rocks has many technological applications.
Titulo: Nanometre pyroxenic glass-ceramics prepared by crystallization of Saudi basalt glass

Sentencas: Crystallization of basaltic glass from the northern Harrat area in the temperature range of 800-1000 degrees C gave augitic pyroxene as the major phase with small amounts of olivine, haematite and magnetite.
Titulo: Nanometre pyroxenic glass-ceramics prepared by crystallization of Saudi basalt glass

Sentencas: Differential thermal analysis (DTA) indicated that the crystallization occurred within 810-900 degrees C, and partial melting occurred near 1150 degrees C.
Titulo: Nanometre pyroxenic glass-ceramics prepared by crystallization of Saudi basalt glass

Sentencas: The microcrystalline structure shows nanospheres 10-100 nm in diameter from the augitic phase in all the crystalline samples, and the nanospheres may include small amounts of olivine, haematite and magnetite.
Titulo: Nanometre pyroxenic glass-ceramics prepared by crystallization of Saudi basalt glass

Sentencas: The dilatometer showed that the glass-transition temperature is 650 degrees C.
Titulo: Nanometre pyroxenic glass-ceramics prepared by crystallization of Saudi basalt glass

Sentencas: The coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) of the glass-ceramic was between 70.84 and 79.91 x 10(-7) degrees C-1.
Titulo: Nanometre pyroxenic glass-ceramics prepared by crystallization of Saudi basalt glass

Sentencas: Additionally, the Vickers microhardness and density values of the basaltic glass-ceramic were within 718-800 kg/mm(2) and 2.88-2.98 g/cc, respectively.
Titulo: Nanometre pyroxenic glass-ceramics prepared by crystallization of Saudi basalt glass

Sentencas: Generally, the samples resistance to acidic solutions is lower than in alkaline solutions.
Titulo: Nanometre pyroxenic glass-ceramics prepared by crystallization of Saudi basalt glass

Sentencas: A thin metallic film on the glass-ceramic surface was obtained after heat treatment at 1000 degrees C due to the oxidation of iron on the surface.
Titulo: Nanometre pyroxenic glass-ceramics prepared by crystallization of Saudi basalt glass

Sentencas: However, the present basaltic glass can be used in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) as a sealant between connectors and fuel cells and as coatings for some metals.
Titulo: Nanometre pyroxenic glass-ceramics prepared by crystallization of Saudi basalt glass
